forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
